website_summaries.verdict: The Acer Nitro 5 won't blow you away with its performance or design, but it is a perfectly competent gaming laptop without any deal-breaking flaws for an aggressive price.
pros: Capable 1080p gaming performance for the price
cons: GTX 1050's performance ceiling with demanding games is limited

customer_reviews.title: Acer Nitro 5 exceeds my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this now for 4 days and it is now completely set up how I want it. It is smart looking in black with red backlit keys. Screen resolution provides really clear text and sharp graphics. Sound, in dolby stereo, is excellent for the size. App loading is really fast and startup speed is excellent with a fast shutdown, even after all my current software has been installed. Thoroughly pleased with this as it now replaces and combines my old Dell laptop and desktop. This is my first Acer and I highly recommend the Nitro 5.
customer_reviews.author: MR JOHN TIMMS

customer_reviews.title: Hardware great, software requires some clean-up
customer_reviews.text: Nice and quiet when not hitting the GPU and reasonably quiet while gaming. Battery life also good. Capable of running light to medium games pinned at 60 FPS. Does come with a fair bit of bloatware though, but is easily removed.
customer_reviews.author: Rik

customer_reviews.title: It's worth it for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is great, I mean it's fast, starts up immediately, silent as a grave and for the price it's really worth it. I wanted something not too expensive that could not only serve as a gaming laptop, but also as an office laptop and it works great. The outside finish is also spectacular snd beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Vella

customer_reviews.title: ... moved on to a desk top this laptop was excellent while i had it
customer_reviews.text: Though i have moved on to a desk top this laptop was excellent while i had it. and i would highly recommend for the price. it could handle games like the witcher 3 and dragon age inquisition at high/ ultra settings at a playable 30-40 fps.
customer_reviews.author: Jegna Sheriffe

customer_reviews.title: Great beginning gaming computer.
customer_reviews.text: Superb laptop for my son who has just started an interest in gaming online with Steam. The computer is very quick and easily handles the games he wants to play. Pretty jealous of him actually *lol*
customer_reviews.author: Leatrix

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: really enjoying using this laptop, bigger than i expected, running everything i want to fine
customer_reviews.author: Liam Short

customer_reviews.title: Great for it's price
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a laptop that would allow me to game, but I was on a budget and the Acer Nitro 5 has been great. I've had it for 3 years now and it still works great. The bad things are bloatware (which you can and should remove), if you use it for streaming and have a web browser open and play a game, then the RAM will max out, but there is space to put in more RAM. The AMD Radeon settings will break every so often which prevents you from updating your graphics, but you can just re-download it from the AMD website.
customer_reviews.author: Paul W

customer_reviews.title: A little bit of a disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I had this laptop for a little while and I can confirm that it runs really hot. I would not recommend this laptop without an additional cooling fan pad underneath. GPU temperatures were reaching 97-98 C when under load. There are some weird stutters when gaming sometimes which is really annoying. For the money I would recommend getting a different laptop (or at least get some additional cooling fan pads for it) I only use it when I'm away from home. Consider different laptops before buying this one. Apart from stuttering and really high temps when gaming, I did not have any other problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: Krystian

customer_reviews.title: Meets a gaming standerd?
customer_reviews.text: Hell yes, it does meet a gaming standerd runs perfectly well, i personally upgraded my rams to 16 gb 2666 mhz and added a sshd 1tb on it And good its actually good. Just my only consern is with their nitrosence application, when u have fan speed on auto it doesnt really keep the pc cooled enough therefore leading to stutters every 5 minutes, easy to fix tho, just make sure you put it on max fan speed when gaming and youll be good
customer_reviews.author: Edward Hajj

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good laptop
customer_reviews.text: I bought this laptop at £800 what I thought would be a better option than I mac around the same price. I use it for paperwork and DAW software's with total ease and can happily play games also, recently playing Fallen Jedi and Call of duty, both running well with good settings and frame rates and with a decent looking screen. The bits what aren't as good but for the price I am not fussed, is the brightness of the screen at full and the loudness of fans, but was still totally worth the purchase. I'm happy I didn't buy a MacBook:)
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Football manager
customer_reviews.text: Used to primarily play football manager. Graphics 5star rating on game and about 50k database. Runs smooth and fast. Very quiet when in use . Light up keyboard is very useful. Can't fault it for a 'budget gaming laptop'
customer_reviews.author: James A

customer_reviews.title: Beware, potential 80C - 100C CPU temperature
customer_reviews.text: i5-8300h, GTX 1060 I bought this for £800, which represents excellent value for money. I don't recommend paying any more than that. However, the CPU can overheat to 80C-100C after 1 hour of gaming. This will degrade (i.e destroy) the CPU over time and also cause laptop performance issues. To remedy this you will need to potentially i) under-volt the CPU ii) open up the laptop and apply new thermal paste to the CPU iii) turn off the CPU turbo boost function If you're unwilling to do any of the above, I don't recommend you buy the laptop unless you plan to use it to fry eggs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor product
customer_reviews.text: Very very disappointed with this product, at first i though it need updates to maybe speed things up, but this became fruitless as i am now left with a laptop that simply dose not work, it is so slow it bearly functions so i go back to using my old laptop, not happy at all
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dell refurbished - No way!
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is so slow it goes backwards at times, I am not even joking, takes1 minute to navigate through google chrome and when you try and install something takes 30 minutes No joke. Even pressing alt ctrl and delete takes 2 minutes for it to do anything.
customer_reviews.author: Simon W.

customer_reviews.title: Fab
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic laptop. Trackpad takes a while to get used to, but other than that, start up is fast, performance is great. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Good budget gaming laptop
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this laptop. It's a great budget gaming laptop. It even plays Fortnite very well. Just update the drivers and make sure your playing on Max performance. This is great for the price. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.text: The laptop is still pretty new, haven't used it for any hardcore gaming. Played a few fortnite games on it which I had on Max settings. The laptop does do it self justice. I really like the design of it and how the keyboard light turns off when your not typing. Overall great product. The only upgrade I'd make is buying a bigger ram and maybe storage, but again that's just me.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Box very damaged. Poorly packed!
customer_reviews.text: Good laptop with excellent sound quality. Downside seller had literally put the laptop in a bag and posted it. . No extra padding whatsoever. . Box arrived damaged. . Computer seems to work ok though.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, powerful but still has major flaws
customer_reviews.text: I've had this laptop for over a month now, and I will update this review if it needs to be changed. So far, it works perfectly. I was sceptical when seeing some of the bad reviews but people have forgotten that you can use switchable graphics to make the game faster. The battery life is small but you get a tank of a machine.
customer_reviews.author: Poco Cuffs

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is painfully slow. It can't even open Google Chrome without lagging. I have a desktop built with a similar amount of money and it performs way faster. It took me 30 minutes to do what's only supposed to take less than 2 minutes with a normal computer. The headache this laptop gives you is not worth the money whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: POOR BATTERY
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE NEVER HAD TO PLUG IN A LAPTOP AS MUCH AS I HAVE TO WITH THIS ONE. THE ONE RELLY BIG WEAKNESS.
customer_reviews.author: EMPEM

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic laptop!
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop with enough space. Nice sturdy charging socket so it is safe from damage. My games work well.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: runs practically all games still, using it now months later, keyboards letters are not very well shown tho. screen is good rez
customer_reviews.author: Greenoakian Ejit

customer_reviews.title: Nice laptop
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with item. Appalled at Amazon for their poor service but the item is great
customer_reviews.author: teetals

customer_reviews.title: Very fast.
customer_reviews.text: I did not believe lap-top could be quick enough for gameing. It even plays steam games.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Faulty battery
customer_reviews.text: Upon arrival the laptop would not charge. Tried and tested different cables, power outlets etc but with no luck so most likely a faulty battery. Had no choice but to return and a replacement was unable to be provided. The price has since been increased so despite being refunded I can’t even buy t again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great working laptop but only came with a 128 GB SDD. It did not come with a 1 TB HDD as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Got the laptop for a present. Works absolutely fine but its advertised with 128 GB SSD and 1 TB HDD. It did not have the 1 TB HDD which is a shame because the storage is already full after installing a few games. Please don't advertise that it comes with a 1 TB HDD if it does not. Now I have to buy that separately.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Lordan

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed so far with this laptop, it does what I require so no complaints from me.
customer_reviews.author: P. Ellis-Macey

customer_reviews.title: Used sold as new
customer_reviews.text: Worst product I ever bought. Amazon send me a opened laptop twice. What an experience that was. Never buy this laptop or you might get scamed by amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Median Borisov

customer_reviews.title: Frames aren’t permanent
customer_reviews.text: Really good laptop good for games such as fortnite and csgo frame rates go to about 240-60fps least and we most of the time stay at around 80-140
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poop
customer_reviews.text: I got it and then it broke I ordered a replacement and then it would crash on YouTube using 80% ram while no program was on
customer_reviews.author: Cian

customer_reviews.title: Gaming laptop..
customer_reviews.text: Superb performance, got it for a great price of £580 from Amazon warehouse.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Good budget gaming Laptop
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is ideal if you want to start PC gaming. Having Windows on SSD helps speed things along
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: BEAST
customer_reviews.text: best gaming laptop for under £1000, even better if you get an amazon warehouse deal
customer_reviews.author: Venuk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good laptop, does everything I need and had no issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Really good gaming laptop, good price , it run amazing
customer_reviews.author: Peppe

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use solely for video editing and it is a fantastic product perfect for my needs. It’s quick and looks amazing very impressed especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. David J. Gunner

customer_reviews.title: Good but not the simplest to start
customer_reviews.text: Issue when booting isn’t simple to turn on can be tricky the screen doesn’t turn on so you have to close the lid and open it to activate screen other than that it seems ok could be a bit cheaper on the price.
customer_reviews.author: Deena P.

customer_reviews.title: Top quality laptop.
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop. Good quality graphics. No disc drive which is unhandy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMD model not recommended.
customer_reviews.text: The AMD version of this product is not fit for purpose. I attempted to play World of Warcraft and Overwatch in medium to low settings and the laptop performed very poorly dipping below 20fps regularly and freezing regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Moon

customer_reviews.title: Says that is SDDR5 but the laptop it come whit
customer_reviews.text: Says that system ram type is GDDR5, but the laptop it come whit DDR4
customer_reviews.author: Adi

product_meta.title: Acer Nitro 5 AN515-42 Gaming Notebook - (AMD Ryzen 5 2500U processor, 8GB RAM, 1TB HDD, AMD Radeon RX 560X 4G, 15.6 inch Full HD IPS display, Windows 10, Black)
product_meta.description: Style Name:R5 2500U, RX 560, No SSDAcer Nitro 5 AN515-42 Gaming Notebook - (AMD Ryzen 5 2500U processor, 8GB RAM, 1TB HDD, AMD Radeon RX 560X 4G, 15.6 inch Full HD IPS display, Windows 10, Black)
feature_bullets: Thrust yourself into the gaming world with a form factor that takes you beyond that of mere mortal laptops.
Submit to the game with tech features that put you in the grip of the experience.
Share the exhilaration of your screen’s true colors with the full high definition IPS display.
Control your system’s crucial functions and keep your gaming session running cool and smooth with Acer NitroSense.
When heavy use requires an added boost, take control of the cooling process with Acer CoolBoost. Call Acer’s technical support team on 0371 760 1000

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars101 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
